name: Hot Slap
description:
A Competitive Multiplayer Hand Slapping Game wherein both of the players is trying to slap the hand of their opponent. The player who are fast enough to slap the hands, will lead the game or accumulate the most points. The who’s faster is not only applicable for the player that gives the offensive approach or the slapping approach, it is also applicable for the player who are defending from the other player, this is possible with the help of the dodge button. Hot hands are created in order to reminisce our childhood game which is the “ketchup”.

HOW TO PLAY:

FOR PLAYER 1 BUTTONS:

A - SLAP
S - DODGE
D - ULTIMATE

FOR PLAYER 2 BUTTONS:

J - SLAP
K - DODGE
L - ULTIMATE

The game can be play in several fight such as tournament mode which the player can fight to 3 to 6 players. The game continues as the player keeps on winning and it is a single elimination, meaning once you lose in the game you are out of the game and it will continue as the player keep on winning the game. Only one player can win in tournament mode. You can also play a game which only 1v1.

The game is develop and made by the students of Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Valenzuela. A role playing and Real-time strategy game which it will lead to victory of a player. The game is made for educational purposes and also serve happiness for the people who wants to download and play the game. Hoping for you support in our game! Thank you everyone!!!!!
